author: Chevaz Clarke
title: McDonald's apologizes after restaurant in China bans black customers
description: African American residents in Guangzhou have been facing increased xenophobia, which forced the U.S. Consulate to issue a travel warning.
content: A McDonald's restaurant in China has come under fire after it was accused of banning black customers from entering. A sign at the Guangzhou eatery that read "from now on black people are not allowed to enter the restaurant" has been circulating on social medi… [+4279 chars]
